## Mock exam

This a mock exam of the course Data Mining. The candidate has **3 hours** to complete the exam.

#### Question 1 (max 15 lines)

Recall the Sherman-Morrison lemma. Obtain a formula for recursive least squares. 

#### Question 2 (max 15 lines)

Derivation of the ridge estimator. Then, discuss the role of $\lambda$; in particular what does it happen when $\lambda = 0$?

#### Question 3 (max 15 lines)

Discuss differences and similarities between regression splines and smoothing splines.
